name: Trick Boarder
description:
Back of Box - Game Boy Color (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

"Play in the first real snowboard simulation on GBC"

You stand poised on the edge of an icy cliff. Strap on your board and get ready for some serious action! Whether you're busting out tricks like indies, tailgrabs and melancholies, or whipping past the competition as you grind on rail, Trick Border has it all!
  • 3 Gameplay modes: Grand Prix, Time Trials and 2-Player mode
  • Big points to score from multiple aerial manoeuvres
  • Choose from 8 different characters each with their own skills!
  • 9 perilous mountains to overcome!
  • Ability to increase your speed and performance by winning various power-ups
